item.title: Workshop: AImath
item.description: AI Transforms Math Research During the week 25-28 August 2025, Kai Cieliebak and i will host a workshop on the use of AI tools in mathematical research in Augsburg, Germany. You can check out more details on the workshop website. Feel free to join!

item.title: Masterthesis
item.description: My masterthesis was on the topic “spaces of positive curvature metrics on nonorientable manifolds”. You can find a pdf version here and the entire LaTeX-Code in the Git-Repository.
